abstract: DealBook Online; Atlas Mara Limited, backed by former Barclays chief executive Robert E Diamond Jr, says it is in exclusive discussions to invest around $22.5 million in Banque Populaire du Rwanda; Atlas Mara says if it acquires stake it will merge bank with BRD Commercial Bank, which it acquired in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The company backed by Robert E. Diamond Jr., the former Barclays chief executive, said it was in exclusive discussions to invest in Banque Populaire du Rwanda.

headline.main: Atlas Mara in Talks for Stake in Second Rwandan Bank

snippet: The company backed by Robert E. Diamond Jr., the former Barclays chief executive, said it was in exclusive discussions to invest in Banque Populaire du Rwanda.
